sentences.en: Each paragraph begins on a new line.
He condensed the paragraph into one line.
sentences.cn: 他把这一段缩减成一行.

sentences.en: Leave two blank spaces at the beginning of each paragraph.
Look at the information that precedes the paragraph in question.
sentences.cn: 查看正在讨论的这段文字前面的信息。

sentences.en: The author lifted the paragraph from someone else's work.
sentences.cn: 这一段是作者从别人的作品中抄来的.

sentences.en: The author mentioned it in the previous paragraph.
sentences.cn: 作者在前一段里提到这件事.

sentences.en: The critic's review of the play was just a paragraph of bile.
sentences.cn: 那位批评家对这部戏剧的评论不过是在发泄怒气。

sentences.en: The editor omitted the third paragraph from the article.
sentences.cn: 编辑删去了这篇文章的第三段.

sentences.en: The length of a paragraph depends on the information it conveys.
sentences.cn: 段落的长度取决于它所传达的信息。
令某些人不悦的那段话已经删除。

sentences.en: the opening paragraphs of the novel
The paragraph is really an essay in little.
sentences.cn: 这一段实际上是一篇小短文.

sentences.en: The printer has left out two lines from this paragraph.
sentences.cn: 印刷工人把这一段漏了两行.

sentences.en: The substance of their talk is condensed into a paragraph.
sentences.cn: 他们谈话的要旨被压缩成一段话.

sentences.en: There's a paragraph on the matter in the paper.
sentences.cn: 报纸对这件事有一短篇报道.

sentences.en: This paragraph can be left out.

trans.tran_en: part of a piece of writing which starts on a new line and contains at least one sentence
